title: nvcc fatal   : Unsupported gpu architecture 'compute_60'
body_html:
After updating the latest pytorch, I encountered the above problem during installation. After checking the commits, I noticed there was indeed a revision to fix this problem. But why does this problem still occurs?

My configuration:
Ubuntu14.04
Cuda7.5+cudnn5
